org.openimaj.data

Class ShortArrayBackedDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.data.ShortArrayBackedDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<short[]>, DataSource<short[]>

    public class ShortArrayBackedDataSource
extends Object
implements DataSource<short[]>
    A DataSource backed by a 2D array of shorts.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Detail

      • getData

        public final void getData(int startRow,
                          int stopRow,
                          short[][] output)
        Description copied from interface: DataSource
        Get data between given rows. startRow must be > 0, stopRow must be smaller than DataSource.size(). data is guaranteed to have (stopRow - startRow) valid entries
        Specified by:
        getData in interface DataSource<short[]>
        Parameters:
        startRow - where to start (inclusive)
        stopRow - where to stop (exclusive)
        output - the array to fill

      • getRandomRows

        public final void getRandomRows(short[][] output)
        Specified by:
        getRandomRows in interface DataSource<short[]>
        Parameters:
        output - a random set of data. This array is guaranteed to be filled.
